channel.title: Command Prompt Menu?
channel.description:
Awhile ago I saw a Command Promt menu and I want the DOS code for it. I had SpuneRace and it was there but I'm useing a laptop and I want the code for it. It was something like this:
echo [1] start server %custom% 1 == goto :start
:start echo starting server......

item.title: Command Prompt Menu?
item.dc:creator: @RXVL RXVL
item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

Awhile ago I saw a Command Promt menu and I want the DOS code for it. I had SpuneRace and it was there but I’m useing a laptop and I want the code for it. It was something like this:

echo [1] start server
%custom% 1 == goto :start

:start
echo starting server…

Read full topic
